channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An ‘Avoidable Tragedy’: The Hazards That Led to the Swiss Fire Disaster
item.description: The fire that killed at least 40 people in a Swiss bar on New Year’s Day was made more likely by apparent flaws in the site’s design and management, e...

item.title: Maduro's ouster on drug charges comes as Trump lets others free
item.description: The military removal of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro on US drug charges comes after Trump has freed other figures connected to narcotics traffi...

item.title: Photos: Aftermath of strikes in Venezuela
item.description: Pictures show the aftermath of the U.S. strikes in Venezuela and the reaction from around the world.

item.title: To Trump, on Venezuela: You Break It, You Own It
item.description: His administration just decapitated the country’s leadership; he’s now responsible for what comes next there.

item.title: Top Republicans praise Venezuela operation as some lawmakers question legal authority
item.description: Top Republicans in Congress praised President Trump for the operation in Venezuela amid calls for briefings in the days to come.

item.title: What are the charges against Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro?

item.title: The Trump Administration Approved a Big Lithium Mine. A Top Official’s Husband Profited.

item.title: Trump Shares Photo of Captured Nicolás Maduro, Blindfolded and Handcuffed
item.description: The Venezuelan president and his wife were flown out of Caracas by helicopter to the U.S.S. Iwo Jima, a warship taking them to New York.

item.title: Trump administration declines to back Venezuela’s opposition leader.

item.title: World Leaders React With Shock and Skepticism After U.S. Captures Maduro
item.description: Several Latin American leaders responded with anger, while European leaders were more cautious. President Trump’s audacious raid drew support, too.

item.title: Venezuela Live Updates: Trump Says U.S. Will ‘Run the Country’ After Capture of Maduro
